name: chill-drive
effect:
Held by genesect
:   Holder's buster is white, and its techno blast becomes ice-type.
short_effect: Grants Genesect a white, Ice-type Techno Blast.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
A cassette to be held by Genesect.
It changes Techno Blast to an
Ice-type move.
